com.facebook.buck.skylark.function

Class SkylarkNativeModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.skylark.function.SkylarkNativeModule

  • public class SkylarkNativeModule
extends Object
    A class for the Skylark native module. It includes all functions provided natively by Buck and are available using native.foo in build file extensions and just foo in build files.

      • readConfig

        public Object readConfig(String section,
                         String field,
                         Object defaultValue,
                         com.google.devtools.build.lib.syntax.FuncallExpression ast,
                         com.google.devtools.build.lib.syntax.Environment env)
                  throws com.google.devtools.build.lib.syntax.EvalException
        Exposes a read_config for Skylark parser.

        This is a temporary solution to simplify migration from Python DSL to Skylark and allows clients to query values from .buckconfig files and --config command line arguments.

        Example, when buck is invoked with --config user.value=my_value an invocation of read_config("user", "value", "default_value") will return my_value.

        Throws:
        com.google.devtools.build.lib.syntax.EvalException
